items.summary: Add the uploaded image (image-9.png) to frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and create a cache-busted, header-optimized transparent PNG logo derived from it at exactly 112px height (preserve aspect ratio; no distortion; no extra padding unless needed to avoid clipping).

Update the site header logo image to use the newly generated cache-busted logo asset (replace the current src "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" in frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx).

Update the website footer brand logo to use the newly generated cache-busted logo asset (replace the current src "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" in frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFooter.tsx).

Generate new favicon assets derived from the uploaded image-9.png (16x16 PNG, 32x32 PNG, and .ico) with cache-busting filenames under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and update frontend/index.html to reference the new favicon filenames (replacing the current favicon.cb_20260209.ico, favicon-32x32.cb_20260209.png, favicon-16x16.cb_20260209.png).

Search the frontend codebase for any remaining references to the previous logo asset path "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" (and any other older GreenPlantz logo assets under /assets/generated/) and update them to the newly generated cache-busted logo asset so the new logo is used everywhere it appears.
